website_summaries.verdict: A very good starter kit with the basic essentials one would need in case of an earthquake or other natural disaster.
pros: Fairly compact kit that stores easily in the car trunk or corner of the pantry
Experienced users feel it is a good starter earthquake kit
“Nothing felt like a throwaway to bulk up the bag,” one user noted
cons: Water containers look like juice boxes, some owners feel, with only just enough water to get by on
Reports of water containers broken or leaking on arrival

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof it's not
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit in 2016 it has been in the bed of my truck since then. The bed has a cap and is not open to the elements. I had to move it today to get at something else. Everything is covered in mold and or rusty almost as if it was submersed under water which it has not. I didn't take anything out as the kit weighs 3 times what it should telling me its full of water. I have to believe its years of condensation and widespread temperature change..Nothing is salvageable so the entire kit needs to go into the garbage. What a shame
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Best of the bunch by far
customer_reviews.text: The most complete, yet compact, kit to keep in your car. I live in earthquake country and take preparedness seriously, this kit from Get Ready Now will replace the lesser product I currently own. I have made a point of showing Get Ready's kit to all my friends; they too agree this is far superior to what they carry and have placed orders as well. If you hope to survive The Big One, owing this kit will improve your chances. It's also handy to have with you for lesser calamities.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Great little survival kit!
customer_reviews.text: Tiny bag filled with tons of essential items. I was amazed to see how compact and light it was, yet surprised at how much stuff was in it the bag. I've already shown it to loads of friends. It is in my car and I feel more secure already!
customer_reviews.author: Leslye

customer_reviews.title: Essential Help to Survive Earthquakes
customer_reviews.text: The kit is an excellent emergency preparedness kit that contains essential survival items. I live in an area affected by earthquakes, so having a kit like this is important.
customer_reviews.author: Katha Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Clear plastic means you can see exactly what’s inside without digging through.
customer_reviews.text: After escaping a wildfire in which we lost our home, I realized how an entire town can have trouble functioning with little to no warning. I purchased this kit for my car. Sometimes that all you have time to get. It has everything I’d need to survive the first 3 days of a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great product! This mama feels safer with it!
customer_reviews.text: Our family just returned from a long road trip and it made me think about traveling the long stretches of highway with two young kids. We decided to order this pack to put in our car and I feel safer with it there! It stores easily and has all the key components I was looking for. My only regret is that I didn't order one for my husband's car and one for our nanny too. Going to do that right now....
customer_reviews.author: Anna E.

customer_reviews.title: This emergency Kit has a headlamp which is great because if there was ever an emergency I would ...
customer_reviews.text: This emergency Kit has a headlamp which is great because if there was ever an emergency I would be able to use both hands if I needed to shine more light to see things. I would recommend this pack to anyone and everyone to be prepared for an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fair purchase
customer_reviews.text: I think I could have done better gathering these items myself but took the easy way. Kind of expensive but better then nothing until I upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: rose letourneau

customer_reviews.title: I actually liked it was clear plastic
customer_reviews.text: it was impressive, I actually liked it was clear plastic , had a lot of items in a small bag. its small enough not to be a bother in the car or truck, but has enough in it to make a difference for when you might really need it
customer_reviews.author: Don C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems very complete....
customer_reviews.text: ...but we won't know how handy it is until we break down!
customer_reviews.author: G. W. Accola

customer_reviews.title: This road pack is a great kit to have for the car
customer_reviews.text: This road pack is a great kit to have for the car. I like that one can see through the plastic pack and it doesn't take up a lot of space. I bought several for gifts and the family members. They really appreciate the emergency supplies and essential survival gear.
customer_reviews.author: Eddi

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a pretty good thing to have in your car in case you get stranded. It doesn’t take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jane

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enough items and small enough to store in small trunck of car.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Items look not as cheap as others. Size is okay. We purchased a hammer (&seat belt cutter) separately.
customer_reviews.author: Ziyao Xu

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great company has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great company has everything you need. The founder even sent me a hand written letter of thanks with a free gift! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: John Baldo

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave it out or it will get used
customer_reviews.text: Wow Loved the cool bag , better in person than pictured. I feel the over all gualiy its better than the normal kits I see. Looks like it's not one use, and throw away! Biggest problem is going to be not using the tools and leaving it alone for emergency
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than others I've seen and WAY better at packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very complete! Better than others I've seen and WAY better at packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic kit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! It has saved me a lot of time and guesswork trying to think of everything I could possibly need in a travel-related emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit, but make sure to check all items
customer_reviews.text: Good to have for the car, although the headlamp doesn't work in our kit (even after replacing the batteries).
customer_reviews.author: Emma L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great, compact kit for cars and other small places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good choice
customer_reviews.text: This looks good. The issue with emergency kits is you never know what you need until you need it. This looks reasonably good for the price. Somewhat heavy but that is because of water--and you need water!
customer_reviews.author: William F. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely compact and lots of valuable goods inside. Great price for everything you get.
customer_reviews.author: Cameren

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Waters were broken inside waterproof packaging. Damaged multiple pieces of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to
customer_reviews.text: The items in this kit is enough to last several days. There are things in this kit very important to serviving being stranded in the winter. I recommend this to all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. High quality items, very sturdy and conveniently see-through bag. I feel much better having it with me in the car! Since receiving it, I've recommended it to all my family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pack was smaller than I thought it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: The pack was smaller than I thought it would be. I have not opened one up because they are Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: BBR

customer_reviews.title: Great kit to be prepared...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of things that people don't worry about until after the fact, kind of like when your house gets burglarized, what is the next thing you do, install a security system or when your car gets broken into, you get a car alarm. This kit has just about everything you would need in an emergency. It's small enough to have in your trunk and not have to worry about. So my final thoughts would be, buy this kit, place it in your car and forget about it and hope you never need it but if you do... You have it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is ok. Seams a little smaller than what ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. Seams a little smaller than what I thought it would be. But it does have a lot of stuff in it. I received this product at a discount for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Full of usefulness.
customer_reviews.text: I did not have high hopes for this. I expected a bunch of poorly made junk in a small package. It is small, but full of great stuff. Lots of light making things, basics to keep warm, a great looking basic multi tool, work gloves. Nothing felt like a throw away to bulk up the bag or item count. Everything I tried worked. Stuff you would actually want in a car. The bag makes it easy to access and to store in the back of my minivan. I got this for a dollar with a coupon in return for writing a review.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: What a great bag! It is fairly small and compact but stuffed with important items I hope I never need to use. It is self-sealing and very sturdy. The LED flashlight is super bright and great quality. Everyone who has seen the kit has said, "Wow! I want one!" It is the type of "just in case" purchase that can be hard to spend money on, but totally worth it in case of emergency. Because of that, it would make a great and appreciated gift.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your car
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a must have for your car. I was shocked by the amount of stuff you get and the quality. Its a great addition to my Subaru and I hope I dont need to be using it anytime soon. But If I do I know that I will be well prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Stockspeed3

customer_reviews.title: I really like how the storage is see-through
customer_reviews.text: You can really tell that the company that puts these packs together has spent time thinking about what you would really need. Everything in this kit is relevant for a myriad of situations during a car emergency...FAST. I really like how the storage is see-through, so you can get to what you need without having to dump all the contents out. I wonder why no other emergency pack company thought about doing it this way. Comprehensive, priced just right, and it fits easily in my car....DUH!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford C. Butter

customer_reviews.title: It's an awesome survival kit to put in your car
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome survival kit to put in your car. It have everything you need, and it doesn't take up much space. I'm going to order another one to put in my house.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, just in case!
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with all it contained. Hopefully will never have to use it, but if I do I will certainly be prepared. Highlights are the boxes water, warmth gear, and multitool.
customer_reviews.author: Talene Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kit to have in the vehicle. I was surprised at everything that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good just-in-caser
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to keep in his car in case of emergency. For the price, I get a little piece of mind. It has quite a few items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing purchase. Full of so many useful things in this bag. So glad I got this, it'll be perfect to keep in the trunk of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Jakubowski

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and compact size is great for traveling and having piece of mind knowing that ...
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and compact size is great for traveling and having piece of mind knowing that the essentials are there if you might need them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope to never use it! But glad I have it.
customer_reviews.text: Great package! All the basic necessities in a water proof bag! Amaze-balls!
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go with quality items.
customer_reviews.text: I have a kit in every vehicle. Also I gave them to all my kids for Christmas. I love the fact that the bag is waterproof. And it has everything you need, ready to go in a small pack. A great value and high quality items for the money it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much useful stuff in here, I'll definitely be thankful when I need it someday.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Super quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Super quick shipping, Nice kit at a great price! The multi tool isn't the best quality but lets hope I never have to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and items inside appear to be of top quality. Hopefully I won't ever have to use it but I feel a little more at ease should the worst happen.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Howard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! Everything I could need! Really impressed with the thought put into the contents 😊👍🏻 highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christine S. Hausserman

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer :-)
customer_reviews.text: Great see through pack design. Expands nicely for my added personel items. Compact and well thought out above quality materials. I really like this included flashlight!
customer_reviews.author: D Gates

customer_reviews.title: Nice Survival Pack
customer_reviews.text: Great pack. A must have for an emergency. The pack is made of durable clear vinyl. I love the multi tool. I keep this in the trunk of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: compact and effective.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size for your car or go bag. It does not take up a lot of space and has all the needed items for an emergency. The flashlight and glow sticks work very good. the bag it comes in and used to store the supplies is strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Mason
